title: What are some top USC admissions essays? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Dear Admissions Officer: This is the point where I’m suppose to tell you what a ‘great’ guy I am, and probably how much time I’ve unselfishly donated to the community at some level… but that direction would be a tall tale, and I’m sure your desk is already stacked high with such yarns. You will note that I have maintained a 4.00 GPA over the past 4 years, and for me, that didn’t come easily… I had to work like a dog… and thus having leisure outside of enjoying meals with my parents… I have had zero time to pursue much else. I encourage you to note that my GPA, and SAT scores are indicative of a high likelyhood of success in most any Major at the Big-U that I settle into, and I won’t waste your time indicating ‘exactly what my ‘life’s ambition’ has been to pursue,’ because frankly, I don’t know yet- such is life. Therefore, unlike some of my imaginative competitors for empty chairs in your school, I prefer not to waste your time with any yarns.” Have a nice day!
